title: xxx: call for project proposals

body.content:
## Details

This call is looking to xxxxxx.
 
For more information, download the call specification.

## Location

The project must cover all of the xxx Local Enterprise Partnership area (xxxx).

## Value

Up to £xxx value of funding is available.

## Deadlines

* Outline application deadline: XX Month Year.
* Full application deadline: XX Month Year.
* Project start date: no later than XX Month Year.

## Completion date

The project must be completed no later than XX Month Year.

## How to apply

### Step one: register

Register by sending an email to [esif1420.ITqueries@communities.gsi.gov.uk](mailto:esif1420.ITqueries@communities.gsi.gov.uk).

Put ‘Register to apply for ESIF’ in the subject line.

In the email, include:

* your full name
* full name of your organisation
* email address
* phone number (including extension)

If you’re already registered, you can make your [outline application](https://logasnet.communities.gov.uk/logasnet) right away.

### Step two: make an outline application

We’ll register you on our system within 10 working days. Then we’ll contact you and tell you how to make your outline application.

You can start preparing your application while you wait. Download the instructions on how to apply.

You are also advised to read details on the [selection and assessment]( https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/european-structural-and-investment-funds-assessment-documents) of projects and the [guidance and requirements](www.gov.uk/government/publications/european-structural-and-investment-funds-project-requirements-and-publicity-materials) on key areas of the funds that a successful applicant will need to comply with.

## What happens next

If your outline application is successful, we’ll contact you and ask you to make a full application.

## Contact details

If you have a question, contact xxx, xxx and xxx.

Call reference number: XXX-XXX

Details

This call is looking to xxxxxx.

For more information, download the call specification.

Location

The project must cover all of the xxx Local Enterprise Partnership area (xxxx).

Value

Up to £xxx value of funding is available.

Deadlines

  • Outline application deadline: XX Month Year.
  • Full application deadline: XX Month Year.
  • Project start date: no later than XX Month Year.

Completion date

The project must be completed no later than XX Month Year.

How to apply

Step one: register

Register by sending an email to esif1420.ITqueries@communities.gsi.gov.uk.

Put ‘Register to apply for ESIF’ in the subject line.

In the email, include:

  • your full name
  • full name of your organisation
  • email address
  • phone number (including extension)

If you’re already registered, you can make your outline application right away.

Step two: make an outline application

We’ll register you on our system within 10 working days. Then we’ll contact you and tell you how to make your outline application.

You can start preparing your application while you wait. Download the instructions on how to apply.

You are also advised to read details on the selection and assessment of projects and the guidance and requirements on key areas of the funds that a successful applicant will need to comply with.

What happens next

If your outline application is successful, we’ll contact you and ask you to make a full application.

Contact details

If you have a question, contact xxx, xxx and xxx.

Call reference number: XXX-XXX
